certifications.title: ETL and Data Pipelines with Shell, Airflow and Kafka
certifications.description: Completed IBM’s ETL and Data Pipelines course, gaining experience in ETL/ELT design, automation with bash/Python, and scalable pipeline orchestration using Airflow and Kafka.

certifications.title: Machine Learning Implementation and Operations in AWS
certifications.description: Completed Whizlabs’ Machine Learning Implementation and Operations in AWS, gaining experience in designing scalable and resilient ML solutions, applying AWS ML services like SageMaker, and implementing secure, production-ready MLOps workflows.

certifications.title: Data Engineering in AWS
certifications.description: Completed data engineering projects in AWS, gaining hands-on experience with data ingestion, ETL, storage, and pipeline automation.

certifications.title: Exploratory Data Analysis in AWS
certifications.description: Completed Whizlabs’ EDA in AWS, gaining experience with data analysis for ML, real-time processing using Kinesis, and building ETL workflows with AWS Glue, S3, and Redshift.

certifications.title: Microsoft Azure Management Tools and Security Solutions
certifications.description: Completed Microsoft’s Azure Management Tools and Security Solutions course, gaining experience with Azure management services, AI and IoT solution selection, and core cloud security capabilities including firewalls, DDoS protection, and application security.

certifications.title: Microsoft Azure Services and Lifecycles
certifications.description: Completed Microsoft’s Azure Services and Lifecycles course, gaining understanding of cloud governance, cost management, compliance standards, SLAs, and how these factors influence secure and well-designed Azure applications.

certifications.title: Introduction to Microsoft Azure Cloud Services
certifications.description: Completed Microsoft’s Introduction to Azure Cloud Services, gaining foundational knowledge of cloud concepts, core Azure services, architecture components, virtualization, storage, networking, and cloud infrastructure fundamentals.
certifications.image: data/images/Introduction to Microsoft Azure Cloud Services.PNG

certifications.title: Data Analysis with R Programming
certifications.description: Completed Google’s Data Analysis with R Programming course, gaining foundational skills in R, data manipulation with Tidyverse, visualization with ggplot2, and creating structured analytical reports using R Markdown.
certifications.image: data/images/Data analysis with R prohgrammin coursera.PNG

certifications.title: ML Algorithms
certifications.description: Completed Whizlabs’ ML Algorithms course, gaining practical understanding of regression, classification, forecasting, and reinforcement learning algorithms, along with hands-on exposure to core ML techniques and model design.

certifications.title: Data Science with R Programming
certifications.description: Completed a Data Science with R Programming course, developing skills in data cleaning, manipulation, visualization, and statistical analysis using R, along with hands-on practice applying data science workflows to real datasets.

certifications.title: Data Science with Python
certifications.description: Gained practical experience in Python data science, using key libraries to clean data, analyze patterns, and build basic machine-learning models.

certifications.title: Python Libraries for Data Science
certifications.description: Learned to work with essential Python libraries for data science, using tools like NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, and Scikit-learn to handle data, explore trends, and support analytical modeling.

certifications.title: Power BI
certifications.description: Completed a Power BI for Beginners course, learning how to prepare data, build interactive dashboards, create DAX calculations, and develop clear visual reports for data-driven insights.

certifications.title: Tableau Training
certifications.description: Learned to create dashboards and visual stories in Tableau, turning raw data into clear, interactive visualizations.

certifications.title: Data Analytics
certifications.description: Explored the essentials of data analytics, including how data is collected, processed, and interpreted to support insights.

certifications.title: Data Science
certifications.description: Gained a beginner-friendly understanding of what data science is, how it works, and where it’s applied in real-world decision-making.

certifications.title: Programming Essentials in Python
certifications.description: Completed the PCAP – Programming Essentials in Python course, gaining a solid foundation in Python programming, including variables, data structures, functions, control flow, and problem-solving for real-world applications.

certifications.title: SQL and Relational Databases
certifications.description: Gained a solid introduction to SQL and relational databases, learning how to query, structure, and manage data using core SQL commands and relational design principles.
certifications.image: data/images/IBM DB0101EN Certificate _ Cognitive Class SQL_page1.png

certifications.title: Business Intelligence using Excel
certifications.description: Built practical BI skills in Excel, using formulas, charts, and basic analysis tools to organize data and highlight key trends.

certifications.title: Data Analysis with Python
certifications.description: Developed practical skills in analyzing data with Python, working with Pandas, NumPy, and visualization tools to explore datasets and extract meaningful insights.
